job_description: We're seeking a data analyst with experience in SQL, Excel, and business reporting. Remote OK.
Assist with Excel cleanups, merging data files, and producing simple charts. Must be detail-oriented.
Support healthcare reporting using Excel and SQL. Bonus if familiar with pandas or Jupyter Notebooks.
Work with CSVs, track donations in spreadsheets, and help create weekly summary reports.
Manual entry of numbers into Excel. Ideal for someone with precision and basic data familiarity.
